data.title: Living Pictures
data.text:
In lieu of an abstract, here is a brief excerpt of the content:

97 pl. 104 Francis Chit. H. M. King Chulalongkorn, Rama V, on his Second Coronation, October 1873. 1873. Albumen print on paper, 27 x 21.5 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.427. 98 pl. 105 Francis Chit. Her Majesty Queen Sri Savarindira. 1890–1891. Albumen print on paper, 30 x 23 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.429. [167.71.63.233] Project MUSE (2024-08-20 11:58 GMT) 99 pl. 106 Francis Chit. King Chulalongkorn (Rama V) and his Son, Crown Prince Maha Vajirunhis, at a Ceremony to Mark the Prince’s Ninth Birthday, Bangkok. 1887. Albumen print on paper, 27.5 x 21.5 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.662. 100 pl. 107 Francis Chit. Garden Statues, Royal Palace, Bangkok. 1891. Albumen print on paper, 27.2 x 21.1 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.666. 101 pl. 108 Francis Chit. His Majesty King Chulalongkorn, Fifth Rama of the Chakri Dynasty. 1890–1891. Albumen print on paper, 30 x 23 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.428. 102 pl. 109 Francis Chit. Reception, Bangkok, Grand Palace. 1890. Albumen print on paper, 21.1 x 27.2 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.665. 103 pl. 110 Francis Chit. ‘Golden Mountain’ inside the Palace on the Occasion of the Ceremonial Haircut to the Heir of the Throne. 1891. Albumen print on paper, 21.1 x 27.2 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.663. 104 pl. 111 Francis Chit. Siam—1st King in State Palanquin. 1873. Albumen print on paper, 19 x 25.4 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2009. 2009.936. 105 pl. 112 Francis Chit. Prince Vajirunhis was Escorted to the Grand Palace for his Investiture as Crown Prince. Bangkok 14 January 1886. 1886. Albumen print on paper, 21.1 x 27.2 cm. Collection of National Gallery of Australia, Canberra. Purchased 2006. 2006.664. 106 pl. 113 Photographer unknown. Queen Saovabha Bongsri. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 22 x 16.2 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. [167.71.63.233] Project MUSE (2024-08-20 11:58 GMT) 107 pl. 114 Robert Lenz. King Chulalongkorn. Early 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 22 x 16.2 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 108 pl. 115 Photographer unknown. King of Siam and Mikado. 1870s. Albumen print on paper, 27.5 x 20 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 109 pl. 116 Photographer unknown. First King of Siam. 1870s. Albumen print on paper, 45.3 x 30 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 110 pl. 117 Photographer unknown. Siamese Princess. 1890–1900. Albumen print on paper, 38.1 x 38.3 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 111 pl. 118 Robert Lenz. Rama V’s Visit to Singapore. 1896. Albumen print on paper, 29.6 x 40.7 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 112 pl. 119 W. & D. Downey. Chulalongkorn in London. c. 1897. Albumen print on paper, 17.5 x 25 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 113 pl. 120 Photographer unknown. Rama V with Children. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 34.5 x 24.5 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 114 pl. 121 Photographer unknown. Children of Chulalongkorn. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 19.5 x 26.8 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. pl. 122 Photographer unknown. Children of Chulalongkorn in Pool. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 19.5 x 26.8 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. [167.71.63.233] Project MUSE (2024-08-20 11:58 GMT) 115 pl. 123 Photographer unknown. Children of Chulalongkorn. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 23.1 x 28.9 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. pl. 124 Photographer unknown. Children of Chulalongkorn. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 23.2 x 28.9 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 116 pl. 125 Photographer unknown. Children of Chulalongkorn. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 23.1 x 28.2 cm. Collection of Mr and Mrs Lee Kip Lee. 117 pl. 126 Photographer unknown. Children of Chulalongkorn. 1890s. Albumen print on paper, 23 x 28 cm. Collection of Mr and...
